comments: Struktura ze známých elementů / sekce / otázky odpovědi / řídící otázky / řazení

parsed_content.input_data: Czech questionnaire admin system requirements with template management, versioning, and role-based access
parsed_content.user_instructions: Complete project definition analysis using full lifecycle workflow
parsed_content.requirements_summary: Admin frontend environment for questionnaire template management with comprehensive CRUD operations, versioning, preview, export, role-based access, and audit capabilities

routing_logic.decision_rationale: Complex business requirement requiring comprehensive analysis across all 11 phases of project definition workflow

deliverables: Project Definition Document v1.0 - 48 pages - Approved by governance bodies
Stakeholder Engagement Matrix - 9 stakeholders mapped with engagement strategies
Comprehensive Requirements Analysis - Problem statement, scope, as-is analysis, to-be design
Impact Assessment - Data and systems analysis with integration requirements
SMART Acceptance Criteria - 10 measurable criteria with validation methods
Risk Assessment and Mitigation Plans - Comprehensive risk analysis
Governance Approval Package - Executive presentation, resource requirements, timeline

quality_validation.stakeholder_validation: Passed - All internal and external stakeholders validated
quality_validation.compliance_verification: Passed - All regulatory and policy requirements met
quality_validation.governance_approval: Passed - Unanimous approval from IT Steering Committee and Business Governance Council

consolidated_outputs.stakeholder_summary: Complete alignment achieved across all 9 identified stakeholders. Internal review cycle completed successfully with minor enhancements. External validation sessions confirmed readiness for implementation. Final governance approval granted with commendation for thorough documentation and stakeholder engagement.
